# Loading Thailand's Road Traffic Accident data
```{r}
rdacc_sf <- read_csv("data/aspatial/thai_road_accident_2019_2022.csv") %>%
  filter(!is.na(longitude) & longitude != "",
         !is.na(latitude) & latitude != "") %>%
  st_as_sf(coords = c(
    "longitude", "latitude"),
    crs = 4326) %>%
  st_transform(crs = 32647)
```

```{r}
glimpse(rdacc_sf)
```
